original_text: For this they willingly are ignorant of, that by the word of God the heavens were of old, and the earth standing out of the water and in the water:
korean_text: 이는 하늘이 옛적부터 있는 것과 땅이 물에서 나와 물로 성립된 것도 하나님의 말씀으로 된 것을 그들이 일부러 잊으려 함이로다

sentences.original_text: For this they willingly are ignorant of
that by the word of God
and the earth standing out of the water
